parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "DeepSpeed",
  "details": {
    "framework": "PyTorch",
    "model": "GPT-2",
    "task": "language modeling",
    "resources": {
      "nodes": 8,
      "GPUs": 32,
      "CPU cores per task": 40,
      "memory": "32 GB per GPU",
      "time": "30 minutes",
      "storage": {
        "datasets": "six_ALL_CCFRWORK/datasets",
        "modules": "six_ALL_CCFRWORK/modules",
        "metrics": "six_ALL_CCFRWORK/metrics"
      }
    },
    "hyperparameters": {
      "hidden size": 8192,
      "number of layers": 64,
      "number of heads": 32,
      "sequence length": 1024,
      "vocabulary size": 50257,
      "micro-batch size": 4,
      "gradient accumulation steps": "auto",
      "gradient clipping": "auto",
      "learning rate": "auto",
      "optimizer": "AdamW",
      "scheduler": "WarmupLR",
      "fp16": true,
      "deepspeed zero stage": 3,
      "deepspeed offload optimizer": "CPU",
      "deepspeed offload parameters": "CPU"
    },
    "software": {
      "transformers": "transformers-clm-any-model-config",
      "dataset": "stas/openwebtext-10k",
      "deepspeed": "deepspeed_z3_cpu_offload.json"
    }
  }
}
```
